project_descr: Support the implementation of the civil service reform priorities towards creating a stable, impartial, professional and citizen-centered civil service and their implementation through capacity building.

outputs.output_descr: The project will support the implementation of the civil service reform priorities towards creating a stable, impartial, professional and citizen-centered civil service.
donor_name: The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and development - Canada

document_name: NATIONAL CONSULTANT to develop a regulation for selecting a representative of civil servants to the Civil Service Council.
RFP/2018/010-Institution/Legal Entity to develop procedures on developing job descriptions of the civil service of Mongolia
